cv_data.content:
MOHAMED KHALED GHAREEB
AI & Machine Learning Engineer | NLP | Computer Vision 
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/mohamed-khaled-3a9021263| GitHub: github.com/ghreeb1 | Email: qq11gharipqq11@gmail.com
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Results-driven AI & Machine Learning Engineer with strong expertise in developing and deploying AI-powered solutions. Proficient in NLP, Computer Vision, Deep Learning, and MLOps. Adept at solving complex problems, optimizing performance, and delivering innovative projects in agile environments. Passionate about leveraging AI to create impactful solutions.
CORE COMPETENCIES
• Machine Learning (Supervised & Unsupervised)  • Deep Learning (CNN, RNN, Transformers)
• Computer Vision (Image Processing, Object Detection)  • NLP (LLMs, RAG, Chatbots)
• Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Scikit-learn  • FastAPI, Docker, Git, AWS
• Data Analysis & Visualization (Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn)
EDUCATION
Bachelor of Artificial Intelligence, Menoufia University
Specialization: Machine Intelligence | GPA: 2.71/4.0 (Good)
Expected Graduation: January 2026
CERTIFICATIONS & TRAINING
• Artificial Intelligence Summer Training – National Telecommunication Institute (NTI), 2022
• Odoo ERP Training, 2024: AI Integration, Financial Transactions, Sales & Inventory
KEY PROJECTS
Memorixal — AI Caregiver Assistant
• Designed and deployed an AI assistant enabling caregivers to communicate effectively with memory-impaired patients.
• Integrated document ingestion, semantic search, and a web interface, improving response relevance by 40%.

Character Simulator RAG System
• Built a scalable character simulation system supporting multi-character interactions using LangChain & FAISS.

Eye Disease Detection
• Trained a CNN model achieving 92% validation accuracy for classifying eye diseases.

Therapist Chatbot
• Developed a therapeutic chatbot improving user engagement by 30% and reducing latency by 4 seconds.
TECHNICAL SKILLS
• Programming: Python
• Frameworks: PyTorch, TensorFlow, FastAPI, Flask
• Tools: Docker, Git, AWS, CI/CD Pipelines
• Databases: MySQL, MongoDB
SOFT SKILLS
Leadership, Problem-Solving, Agile Team Collaboration, Communication
LANGUAGES
English: Advanced (Reading & Writing)
education: Bachelor of Artificial Intelligence, Menoufia University
• Artificial Intelligence Summer Training – National Telecommunication Institute (NTI), 2022
experience: AI & Machine Learning Engineer | NLP | Computer Vision

Results-driven AI & Machine Learning Engineer with strong expertise in developing and deploying AI-powered solutions. Proficient in NLP, Computer Vision, Deep Learning, and MLOps. Adept at solving complex problems, optimizing performance, and delivering innovative projects in agile environments. Passionate about leveraging AI to create impactful solutions.
Leadership, Problem-Solving, Agile Team Collaboration, Communication

messages.content:
Let's get started with the interview. Based on your CV and our recent conversation, I'd like to ask:

Can you elaborate on how you would apply your expertise in MLOps to a real-world scenario where data quality and preparation are critical factors? How do you ensure that AI models are optimized for production environments?

(Note: I'll be playing the role of an interviewer, so feel free to respond as if you were in a real interview.)
